A2 a unit for measuring the volume of a liquid or a gas, equal to 1,000 cubic centimetres: The tax increase will add 4p to a litre of petrol.
More examplesFewer examplesMy new car does 30 km to the litre uses one gallon of fuel.One litre is equal to 1.76 imperial pints.We'll need a litre of gloss paint to cover the woodwork.Add a scant half litre of milk to the mixture and stir well.They cut 2p per litre off the price of unleaded.
